action.action-desc: Mr. Sean Patrick Maloney of New York (for himself, Mr. Rangel, Mr. Tonko, and Mr. Crowley) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To make loans and loan guarantees under section 502 of the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 available for implementing positive train control systems, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Commuter Rail Passenger Safety Act.
Section 502(b)(1) of the Railroad Revitalization and Regulatory Reform Act of 1976 (45 U.S.C. 822(b)(1)), is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking facilities. and inserting facilities; or; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: implement a positive train control system, as required by section 20157 of title 49, United States Code.

section.header: Extension of railroad safety technology grants
section.text: Section 20158(c) of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking 2009 through 2013 and inserting 2014 through 2018.
